column6: the police force of the Trapeang Krial International border checkpoint detained a Chinese national  crossing into Cambodia in connection with drug trafficking.------Police said that the Chinese man
column9: had been stopped in a police check and was found with 0.9 kg of what is suspected to be illegal narcotics (*most likely meth) hidden in a packet of tea.------The police force handed over the suspects and the evidence to the Stung Treng police station to take action according to the law. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/456332
